document_data.name: Halandras
document_data.mainbody: '''Halandras''' was a kindly sellsword and blacksmith inhabiting [[Tulmon]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p165">
document_data.Description: Halandras' body was covered with a variety of tattoos.<ref name=EotSS-p165"/>
document_data.Activities: He enjoyed leaving the forge behind in pursuit of a little adventure and coin.<ref name=EotSS-p165"/>
document_data.Possessions: An enchanted amulet was sewn under his skin somewhere that allowed him to use the ''[[word of recall]]'' [[spell]]. When used, the amulet immediately transported him to the temple of [[Lathander]] in Tulmon where he had access to [[healing potion]]s and other useful magic.<ref name=EotSS-p165"/>
